sentences: Several speakers highlighted technology transfer and the five year programme of work on adaptation.
Jamaica, on behalf of the G-77/CHINA, expressed concern at the GEF resource allocation framework.
The UK, for the EU, called for an 'open mind' and 'creative and innovative ways' to address climate change after 2012.

Kenya, for the AFRICA GROUP, noted an inadequate commitment on capacity building, while Bangladesh, on behalf of the LDCs, highlighted the need to operationalize the LDC, Adaptation and Special Climate Change Funds.
enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
